attributes.additional_details: This petition is regarding an independant SIKH nation of KHALISTAN, which the SIKHS have been denied for centuries and it is every person's right to have freedom, as a Religion and Human Rights for everyone, i want the British Government to help the SIKHS establish an independant Nation from india, so the SIKHS can live free, without fear and unfair breach of Human Rights, please can the British Government take this up with the United Nations regarding india's treatment of minorities like SIKHS.
